comment.fsit.sneak.angle: Minimal pitch to sitting or crawling down
comment.fsit.sneak.delay: Time in ms between sneaks for sitting or crawling down
comment.fsit.sittable.enabled: Toggles sit by use on listed blocks
comment.fsit.sittable.radius: Radius of sit by use feature
comment.fsit.sittable.blocks: List of block tags (e.g. "logs") available to sit
comment.fsit.sittable.tags: List of block ids (e.g. "oak_log") available to sit
comment.fsit.misc.riding.radius: Use player to start riding radius
comment.fsit.misc.riding.height: Amount of height above player when riding
message.fsit.onride: Look up and Press %1$s to dismount player
